IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING SUITED TO THE SPECIAL NEEDS AND REQUIREMENTS OF ELIGIBLE OCCUPANTS AS DETERMINED BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HUD.
IRS990.MissionDescription: PROVIDE AFFORDABLE HOUSING SUITED TO THE SPECIAL NEEDS AND REQUIREMENTS OF ELIGIBLE OCCUPANTS AS DETERMINED BY THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HUD.
IRS990.Description: DEVELOPMENT AND MANAGEMENT OF A 24 UNIT APARTMENT COMPLEX IN WINDHAM, MAINE. THE FACILITY IS SUITED FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH SPECIAL NEEDS AND LIVING REQUIREMENTS.

Form990PartVIISectionA.Title: VP OF MGMNT AND ASSIST LVG

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE MEMBERS INCLUDE THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE ELECTED BY ITS MEMBERS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR APPROVING GOVERNING DECISIONS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM 990 IS SENT TO THE BOARD MEMBERS FOR REVIEW AND APPROVAL.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PERFORM AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL ORGANIZING AND OPERATING DOCUMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST.
